Pybart's documentation!
=======================

Introduction
------------

Pybart is an application that links the game and the ElectoEncephaloGram in a Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) system.

Currently pybart is only compatible with BrainVision Recorder and The BCI game MYB.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   tutorial
   architecture
